text.__SUMMARY__: Shorea megistophylla is a species of plant in the Dipterocarpaceae family. It is endemic to Sri Lanka.
text.Sources: Ashton, P. (1998). "Shorea megistophylla". The IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. IUCN. 1998: e.T30822A9580478. doi:10.2305/IUCN.UK.1998.RLTS.T30822A9580478.en. Retrieved 22 December 2017.
